alert.note: Alert for Carter; Custer; Fallon; Northern Rosebud; Powder River (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 26 at 6:39PM MST until December 27 at 6:00AM MST by NWS Billings
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON MST TUESDAY... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills as low as 35 below zero. * WHERE...Northern Rosebud, Custer, Fallon, Powder River and Carter. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 6 AM MST Monday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, until noon MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and reduced visibility. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. For the latest road conditions, call 5 1 1. Additional graphics for this hazard can be found at http://www.weather.gov/billings

area.areaDesc: Carter; Custer; Fallon; Northern Rosebud; Powder River
